inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('SpellDamage', 'Stackable', 10); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Offensive Spell Focus
description: You have focused on the casting of destructive magic.  All of your spells do an additional 10% damage.  Note that either this Ability of Healing Spell Focus can be gained by a given character, not both.
